title: FS (Prices reduced)- Several graded T206's with off backs, grouping 2.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Prices reduced)- Several graded T206's with off backs, grouping 2.
posts.post_content:
For Sale (PRICES REDUCED) - Grouping 2, tougher off backed graded T206's (many low population cards). Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking. Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Harry Lord EPDG - SGC 1 $135 venmo no fee or $140 pp gs

T206 Chief Meyers Portrait Tolstoi (Partial name at top) - SGC 2.5 SOLD

T206 Frank Smith Tolstoi - SGC 4.5 $630 venmo no fee or $665 pp gs

T206 Admiral Schlei Tolstoi - PSA 2 $240 venmo no fee or $245 pp gs

T206 Lee Tannehill Sovereign 460 - PSA 4  SOLD
T206 John Titus EPDG - SGC 2 $520 venmo no fee or $540 pp gs

T206 John Titus Old Mill - SGC 3 $560 venmo no fee or $585 pp gs

T206 Kaiser Wilhelm Hands at Chest EPDG - PSA 2 $167.50 venmo no fee or 173.50 pp gs

T206 Kaiser Wilhelm with Bat, Polar Bear - PSA 2.5  SOLD

T206 Kaiser Wilhelm with Bat, Tolstoi - PSA 1 $170 venmo no fee or 176 pp gs.

Good morning,
Beautiful cards, I'm trying to stay with PSA and was hoping you would consider my offer on three of your cards.
Lee Tannehill Sov 460 PSA 4
Kaiser hand at chest EPDG PSA 2
Kaiser bat Tolstoi PSA 1
For all three, $450 via PP or Zelle.
Thank you for your time.
